title: Ticket #2646: Create a DAG generation tool
description: Create a tool to automatically generate a DAG, at least for some common cases like a diamond DAG that is doing something like a parameter sweep. The width of the diamond and some kind of input and output parameters to the jobs (expressed in terms of "job number" or something) should be arguments to the tool. The tool should probably take some kind of templates for the submit files (re-use the same submit file for all "sibling" jobs).
